messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Attention Crew:: Due to concerning radio transmissions coming from your station, we are sending a Centcom Official to investigate, They will be reporting their findings. Please comply with any of their requests.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All of ur moms are gay xdddd

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Benjamin is like, pretty hot tbh

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Also a lot of people are kinda like, dead - so preez be carful

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Escape Pod Three.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Inspector poth, Your sensors have flatlined, If you have been stripped help is on the way, Hold on

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nuclear Self Destruct Codes Requested

The codes for the on-station nuclear self-destruct have been requested by Lockie Stroh. Confirmation or denial of this request will be sent shortly.
